name: LudumDare 48 - MushDeepMushLeak
description:
Classically unfinished game jam game :D

On the theme "Deeper & Deeper" the idea was you've taken a bunch of mushrooms and suddenly need to take a leak, as you try to make your way to the bathroom, your hallway becomes a maze. You must make it to the toilet before the pissMonster gets you.

Player Character courtesy of @krispdi on IG
